title: 1942 Dodge Pickup Truck For Sale
content: 350 Chevy crate engine 350 turbo auto transmission Air conditioning (needs tune-up) 17,000 miles on the engine Leather interior and headliner New white wall tires Wood truck bed Front disc brakes All new gauges Vintage plates go with the truck $23,750 OBO Email: 1942dodge@jasonmichaels.com
source: Studebaker Guide - Studebaker Cars and Studebaker Trucks - Studebaker Champion
